storyInfo: Shelly begins to hallucinate on the set, putting herself in danger and rescued by Lucian at the critical moment. Lucian uses the incident as an opportunity to find out more about the accident from five years ago—the tragic death of a young actress named Laura.

attributes.content: Forget your poor brother and elope with me, Lady Dupont!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Come to your senses, Second Rockefeller!
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: You heard the Messenger. There is no 'Lady Dupont'. That nobility, elegance, intelligence... everything you loved about me is but dust in the wind.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: I am not worthy to be your wife. Not yours, nor your brothers'.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: I'd still love you, even without the Dupont name!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: It was your brother, the dead man, who had been using you all this time. You're an innocent victim in all this deception. Don't blame yourself.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: But?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: But the reception hall is filled with guests, come to pay their respects. The name Dupont may be an illusion, but it would not be appropriate for me to leave this house right in front of them...
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: Don't worry, my love, I know a way to leave this manor now, and be free of these family conflicts forever.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: How?
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: Have you forgotten? I'm a soldier.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Look!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Th-This is...
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: I made this wire from materials I found in the storage room. It will take us from this balcony, across the garden, and into the forests behind the manor.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Come with me, to a place where wealth and status don't matter!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Oh, my dear soldier, your methods are so crude!
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: What if your pulley gets stuck? We would be hanging in the air for hours, until someone finds us... Or the rope could snap, sending us plummeting into the forests.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: Trust me, it's very safe. I would never let any harm come to you.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I-Is it? I-I think I'm going to fall—
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: No—!
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: 'Someone just fell! Call the ambulance, now! There's blood everywhere... Don't just stand there, Shelly!'
She feels a chill run up her spine. She cannot move even her fingers. The sound of fraying cords pulls at her nerves.
'What on Terra happened...?'
'An accident caused by an aging wire rig? And the case is closed, just like that? Someone died!'
No... the two accidents were not alike. Dalton died from a stab wound, while the actress from five years ago died from a fall.
She hears that ominous sound again. Where is it coming from?
...Shelly? Shelly!
Get away from there! The container's about to fall!
F-Fall?
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Shelly looks up in a daze.
The container hanging in mid-air is coming closer and closer, as though she is the one hanging in mid-air, and she is about to fall.
As it fills her vision, a shadow appears next to her, and a pair of strong hands grabs her by the shoulder.
Shelly feels the world spin. By the time she comes to her senses, she is standing on the other side of the set, safe and sound.
Lucian... th-thank you.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: You can let go now.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Oh, sorry.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Not you.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Moira, yes? You can let go now.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: A-Alright...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Only then does Shelly see the small frame of the prop master, grabbing the rope connected to the container with all her might, her arms trembling and her face red.
Only when Lucian repeats his words does she slowly release it.
You're too on edge.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: I-It's my job as prop master.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: What happened...?
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: We should be asking YOU that!
attributes.name: Staff

attributes.content: Sure, these containers are getting old, and need to be checked to ensure the ropes don't get loose, but—
attributes.name: Staff

attributes.content: Are you out of you mind?!
attributes.name: Staff

attributes.content: Not only did you interrupt the shot by screaming out of nowhere, you didn't even budge when that thing was about to fall on you!
attributes.name: Staff

attributes.content: What could have spooked you like that? Is this your first time seeing a wire rig or what?!
attributes.name: Staff

attributes.content: No... Seeing Melanie and Michael brought back memories of that fall five years ago—
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Go take a break, Shelly. You're getting in the way of the shooting.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: (Leaps over a prop box)
attributes.name: Miss.Christine

attributes.content: (Brushes against Lucian)
attributes.name: Miss.Christine

attributes.content: N-No, I mean, I was just spooked by that mysterious black creature running around over there...
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Sorry. Please continue.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: (Unhappily swishes tails)
attributes.name: Miss.Christine

attributes.content: You know, Shelly's not half-bad looking, but she's always so jumpy, and it makes me uneasy.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: A shame the scene was interrupted. I was just getting into my role...
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: 'Getting into your role'?
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: You ought to be thanking her for interrupting that take, because I was about to chew your head off.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: Your delivery, your posture, your expressions... We've been at this for two months, and you've shown no sign of improvement. That rookie could act circles around you on his first day in front of a camera.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: I thought I told you to keep your private life off the set. It would seem Greta was wrong about you.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: It was a mistake to give the leading role to a pretty boy who gets cast from the color of his ears alone. And three different roles in the same film, no less.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Hmph. Why the sudden modesty?
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: Normally, you'd be coming up with all sorts of flippant excuses by now.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: I was just thinking about poor old Dalton...
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I don't have anywhere near your experience. And Shelly's close call just now has left me a little shaken.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Be professional.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: Accidents, failures, bad reviews... You'll never make it in Wrankwood if you let little things like that affect you.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: I could learn a lot from you in that regard.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I heard you were standing right behind Marianne when she swept the Wrankwood Awards with a film completed in just twenty-eight days?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: And that after coming home empty-handed and being ridiculed by the press, you went back to the set the very same day to continue shooting.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I'd have quit ages ago if I had to compete with a superstar like that.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: And what's that supposed to mean?
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: I... oh!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: No no no, I didn't mean it like that! You've just been so calm in the face of Dalton's death, and I wanted to know your secret. That's all, I swear!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Secret? There's no secret. It's only because I didn't know him that well, and had nothing to do with his accident.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: You, though.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: Why is his death affecting you so much? Were you involved in it?
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: Could it all be a coincidence?
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Am I just imagining things?
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Should I see a psychiatrist?
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: You shouldn't use Miss.Christine as an excuse.
Who's there?!
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: She wasn't where you said she was, and wouldn't have run around in a way that would disturb you.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Please apologize to her on my behalf.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: I will.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: What is it you're so afraid of?
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: ...What I'm NOT afraid of, after that accident on set five years ago?
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: I know that look. Curiosity.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: I mean, I can tell you—it's not exactly a secret. You could find out with just a little digging.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Her name was Laura.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: She was a rookie actress in Wrankwood who caught Greta's eye. Extremely passionate about her work, but knew nothing about the unspoken rules of the business.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Dalton was already an alcoholic at the time, but he was still a big name. He decided to put her in her place, by adding extra scenes that kept her in a wire rig for six, seven hours.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Until the wires broke... and she fell to her death.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: The way the blood spread out from under her... It was just like what happened to Dalton...
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Lucian looks at Shelly's arm. There are marks of self-harm all over it, signs of the impact the incident has had on her.
Shelly pulls down her sleeves, her face filled with anxiety.
But I can take care of my own problems.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: You're underestimating those problems.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: This will only become more frequent. At first, only similar sounds would trigger the hallucinations, but now, even the sound of a chair being dragged can take you back into the past.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Gee, thanks for the concern, 'Doctor Lucian'.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: I've dealt with these wicked voices in my head for five years. I know them better than anyone.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: All I can do is outrace them. Do as much as I can before fear and irrationality take over.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Maybe Dalton's death really was just an accident. But either way, I have to eliminate any possible risk, any possible threat, to prevent that incident five years ago from happening all over again.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Even if the threat is coming from the film crew itself...
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: There's something else you're concerned about.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Greta's hiding something.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: We share an office. I saw a strange document on her desk before the plate left central Wrankwood. She stopped me when I was about to open it.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: The riddles just keep piling up, but everyone I know who was there back then and went through the same thing would rather not bring it up. No way can we talk about this with each other openly.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: And now, I'm being constantly interrupted by these voices and hallucinations...
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Pain can mitigate them.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: ...What did you say?
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: I said 'pain'.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: It won't rid you of your anxiety or panic attacks, but it will give you time to breathe, to do what you really want to do, and solve the unsolved mysteries.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: The voices and shadows hide in tiny corners, impeding and distracting you as you try to find yourself...
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Pain is one form of resistance, though fingernails alone may not be enough.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: The tip of a pen, or a knife... With the proper application of force, any sharp object can be of help.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: The tongue, the back of the hand, the top of the thigh... Those areas are more sensitive to pain.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: You... You're a weird guy, you know that? But you sound like you know what you're talking about with hallucinations.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Have you ever had to calm yourself like that?
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Pain is a form of mitigation.
Strange whispers, strange sights...
Except, unlike Shelly, the problem he faces is not the fear of these things, but the desire for them.
Lucian hasn't returned the Originium phonograph yet?
attributes.name: Troupe Member A

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Troupe Member B

attributes.content: He must be anxious. Didn't Whiteflower say he's had trouble sleeping?
attributes.name: Troupe Member B

attributes.content: Too much superficiality in his ecstasy and anguish. He doesn't understand more complex, more extreme emotions. It limits his performances.
attributes.name: Troupe Member B

attributes.content: But he's young. Why the rush?
attributes.name: Troupe Member A

attributes.content: It's been six or seven years since Lucian joined. With his beautiful voice, he was considered a rising star at first, and the leader instructed him personally.
attributes.name: Troupe Member B

attributes.content: But he's hit a wall now that he's finally in a lead role.
attributes.name: Troupe Member B

attributes.content: Listening to those records won't solve anything!
attributes.name: Troupe Member A

attributes.content: Emotions are an actor's weapons. The first step is to understand them.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Master said your ecstasy and anguish are merely superficial. That imitation will only compromise your perception of more complex emotions.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: But how...
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Despair. True despair will cost you what you hold most dear, yet at the same time open a new door.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: You will listen to the whispers you have never listened to, witness everything you have never witnessed, and understand all the emotions that you never understood...
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: You shall become drama itself, the mirror of all things.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Like this—
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*—
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Lucian destroyed his own voice.
Originium pours into the wound, and he is inundated in pain and despair.
Blood...
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Ow...
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: It's alright, Lucian! I'm here!
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: What happened?!
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: (Hoarse sobbing)
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: (Changed voice) So... this is...
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Did you do this to yourself, Lucian?
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Do you remember my last performance... or rather, assassination?
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: I failed. They called me a pathetic coward.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: I'm no longer a favored son of the arts. I don't care about being isolated or scorned, because my heart had already left the Troupe after that performance...
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: But I stayed... because we came from the same place, because we're... friends.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: You promised you wouldn't be like them...
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Master... was right...
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: I'm scared... of this Troupe, and of who you are now.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: In any case, it will be even more effective than you expect.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: I just hope I never need to use that trick of yours.
attributes.name: Shelly
